medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began for the last few days, described as sharp and worse with positional changes. The patient has experienced some nausea, poor appetite, and fevers/chills, with the last bowel movement being normal yesterday. There was a report of right groin pain three weeks ago following participation in a 5K, which quickly resolved. This is the first instance of pain like this.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Asthma, depression anxiety, migraine, obesity, pneumonia, sleep apnea, tubal ligation
medical_history.family_history: Father had colon cancer; cousin had rectal cancer. No family history of inflammatory bowel disease.
